title: Love Island's Amber Gill looks phenomenal in a hot pink bikini from Miami break
text:
She recently enjoyed a sun-soaked trip to Miami in preparation of her upcoming MissPap range.

And Amber Gill appeared to pine for her sunny break as she shared a sizzling throwback image on Instagram on Tuesday evening.

The Love Island winner, 22, caught the eye as she displayed her envy-inducing physique in a hot pink bikini, while joking her shady persona 'could solve global warming'.

Amber Gill appeared to pine for her recent Miami trip as she shared a sizzling throwback image on Instagram on Tuesday evening

Highlighting her tanned and toned figure, the reality star looked phenomenal in her vibrant two-piece, which featured yellow blotch print patterns throughout.

The former beauty technician ensured focus remained on her incredible frame as she kept accessories to a minimum for her beach outing.

With her tresses worn in its naturally curly state, Amber showcased her naturally radiant complexion as she went make-up free.

'Word on road': The Love Island star, 22, caught the eye as she displayed her envy-inducing physique in a hot pink bikini, while joking her shady persona 'could solve global warming'

The media personality captioned the sensational snap: 'Word on road Amber’s shade throwing could solve global warming.' [sic]

During her time in the sunny city, Amber also met secret Love Island fan and rapper Tyler, The Creator.

In an Instagram clip, the bombshell appeared star-struck as she was presented pancakes for breakfast by the award-winning musician, 28, ahead of a fashion shoot.

Wow-factor! The former beautician recently enjoyed a trip to Florida in preparation of her upcoming MissPap range

Surprise! During her time in the sunny city, the media personality also met secret Love Island fan and rapper Tyler, The Creator

Loose Women panelist Amber captioned the short video: 'He just presented me with this at breakfast with his bare hands... Life just gets weirder.'

The Newcastle native has thrown herself into work since her break-up with fellow Islander Greg O'Shea, 24.

Despite being crowned the champions of Love Island 2019, the couple parted ways after just 39 days, the record for the shortest ever relationship had from winning the show.

Amber has since joked that Greg can 'keep his' £25K share from the £50K prize fund after an outcry from her fans who demanded the Irish hunk give back his portion of the winnings.
